Package antichess.test

Class Summary
AITests Some sanity tests for the AI -- it makes legal moves
AllTests AllTests is a jUnit test suite containing all the automated antichess tests
AntichessBoardEvaluatorTest Tests to verify that the AntichessBoardEvaluator returns the expected values for various AntichessBoards.
AntichessBoardTests Tests for the functionality of AntichessBoardTests.
ChessBoardTests Tests for the functionality of ChessBoards and their methods.
ChessBoardTimeProfile  
ChessMoveTests Automated tests for ChessMoves.
ControllerStateTests  
GameDescriptorTests Test the GameWriter class
GameReaderTests Tests for the GameReader class
GameWriterTests Test the GameWriter class
MachinePlayerTests Test the MachinePlayer class.
MoveGeneratorTests Tests that the various pieces generate the correct moves.
MoveHistoryTests  
MoveHistoryViewTests Tests to verify the output of the MoveHistoryView, namely, that moves are being displayed correctly in the Move History section of the GUI.
NullMoveGenerator This class is a stub MoveGenerator that produces no moves.
NullPieceType NullPieceType is a PieceType with type "NULL" and a NullMoveGenerator
PieceTests Tests for the Piece class
TextAIPlayerTests  
TextPlayerTests  
TimeProfiler Simple Timer class for profiling.
